title: Is my money secure when I transfer it?
details: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and protected by advanced security protocols to ensure your money and personal information are safe.

title: What should I do if my transaction fails?
details: If your transaction fails, please contact our support team with the transaction ID. Weâ€™ll investigate the issue and resolve it as soon as possible.

title: How can I view my transaction history?
details: You can view your transaction history by navigating to the 'Transaction History' section in your account dashboard. All past transactions will be listed with details.

title: Can I transfer money internationally?
details: Yes, international money transfers are available depending on your account type and the recipient's country. Additional fees and currency conversion rates may apply.
